de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm

Class AbstractAlgorithm<R extends Result>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.lmu.ifi.dbs.elki.algorithm.AbstractAlgorithm<R>
  • Type Parameters:
    R - the result type
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Algorithm
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ABOD, AbstractAggarwalYuOutlier, AbstractBiclustering, AbstractClassifier, AbstractDistanceBasedAlgorithm, AbstractFrequentItemsetAlgorithm, AbstractNeighborhoodOutlier, AbstractNumberVectorDistanceBasedAlgorithm, AbstractPrimitiveDistanceBasedAlgorithm, AbstractProjectedClustering, AffinityPropagationClusteringAlgorithm, ALOCI, BestOfMultipleKMeans, ByLabelClustering, ByLabelHierarchicalClustering, ByLabelOutlier, ByModelClustering, CASH, CLIQUE, COPAC, DiSH, DOC, DummyAlgorithm, EM, EMOutlier, ERiC, ExternalClustering, ExternalDoubleOutlierScore, FastOPTICS, FeatureBagging, FlexibleLOF, GaussianModel, GaussianUniformMixture, GeneralizedDBSCAN, GeneralizedOPTICS, HiCS, KMeansBisecting, KMeansOutlierDetection, KNNKernelDensityMinimaClustering, LMCLUS, LoOP, NullAlgorithm, OPTICSXi, OutRankS1, OUTRES, P3C, ParallelGeneralizedDBSCAN, RescaleMetaOutlierAlgorithm, SimpleOutlierEnsemble, SNNClustering, SOD, SUBCLU, TrivialAllInOne, TrivialAllNoise, TrivialAllOutlier, TrivialAverageCoordinateOutlier, TrivialGeneratedOutlier, TrivialNoOutlier

    public abstract class AbstractAlgorithm<R extends Result>
extends Object
implements Algorithm

    This class serves also as a model of implementing an algorithm within this framework. Any Algorithm that makes use of these flags may extend this class.

    Since:
    0.2
    Author:
    Arthur Zimek
